Summary: Authentication & Roles
Description: All authentication, authorization, and session security for the Sharetea SaaS. Includes OAuth 2.0, JWT, RBAC, and auditability. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Database and Migrations
Description: Relational schema, migrations, constraints, and seed data powering the POS. Optimized for integrity and performance. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: ORM / Data Access Layer
Description: Typed data access using an ORM/repository pattern. Enforces validation, pagination, and data contracts. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Menu Service Backend
Description: Menu, categories, toppings, allergens, and availability. CRUD and cache invalidation for pricing and presentation. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Inventory Service Backend
Description: Inventory transactions and alerts. Usage, receiving, waste, and stock ledgers. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Orders Service Backend
Description: Order state machine and pricing. Item modifiers, totals, and lifecycle events. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Payments Service Backend
Description: Payment capture, refunds, reconciliation, and provider webhooks with idempotency. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Realtime / KDS
Description: Event bus and WebSocket delivery for kitchen displays and live updates. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Cashier POS Frontend
Description: Web-based cashier UI for fast order entry, error handling, and cashier workflows. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Customer Kiosk Frontend
Description: Self-service ordering with accessibility-first design and multilingual support. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Manager Portal Frontend
Description: Administrative dashboards, menu/inventory management, and configuration. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Menu Board Frontend
Description: Public display for pricing, availability (86), and promotions on TV screens. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Analytics and Reports
Description: Sales, inventory, and weather-correlated analytics with exports. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: DevOps and Security
Description: Build, deploy, secrets, WAF, and observability pipelines for the stack. Define success metrics and exit criteria.

Summary: Accessibility and Usability
Description: WCAG 2.1 AA audits, screen reader testing, and usability reporting. Define success metrics and exit criteria.
